cause.description:
Everyday, kids are left homeless or are kicked onto the street with no food and no where to stay. Our mission is to help those kids and get them food and a shelter so that they can still continue living somewhat of a normal life.
1. homelessness must stop.
2. Every one deserves a home.
3. Help live a normal life with food and shelter.
cause.mission: Make sure every one has a place to stay at night.
cause.name: Help keep kids off the streets
